title: Capturing memories in video art
description: Using video mapping and projection, artist Gabriel Barcia-Colombo captures and shares his memories and friendships. At TED Fellow Talks, he shows his charming, thoughtful work -- which appears to preserve the people in his life in jars, suitcases, blenders ...
author: Gabriel Barcia-Colombo
keywords: TED, talks, TED Fellows, design, history, memory, online video, storytelling, art
